name: Bumble Marbles
description:
Welcome one and all to the wonderous game Bumble Marble. Where you can play with your friends and try to CRUSH each other while in a marble. But make it PG so in reality you are crushing pumpkins cause we ain't that dark. This game was made during a Game Jam at UAT (University of Advancing Technology) with a wonderful group of people. It is multiplayer and it uses gamepads (like xbox 360 and ps4 like controllers) for moving around the arena.

Our wonderful Game Developers:

Raul Montes

Alec Carter

Lyndsey Boggs

Kaulana Lee

Morgan Kitay

Jake Fusco

Darin Palermo

Ruth Luis
